about_the_game:
Story

On an island floating in the sky, there lived a group of women and succubi.
Erin is a magician in the village who often uses magic to
solve problems for the villagers, earning their love and admiration.
However, the villagers began to disappear one after another due to the succubi's curse.
Upon learning of this, the gods transformed Erin into a male appearance.
Erin began to have sex with the villagers to lift the curse and save them from disappearing.

Can Erin save all the villagers? Everything is in your hands.

Features

Interact with the female characters anytime:
Various women in the village, whether they are waitresses working in a restaurant,
villagers reading in the park, receptionists, speakers, exhibitionists,
martial artists, joggers, priestesses, guards, and more,
you can imbue them with magic anytime and anywhere.

※More than 20 girls have sex scenes.
※You can customize how the girls refer to her and your genitalia.
※You can customize the background for sex scenes.
※Backgrounds include an alley, bathroom, classroom, restaurant, castle, outer space, etc.
※Other customization options: CG image size, bgm during sex scenes, specific dialogue for certain female characters, etc.

A hentai adventure game:
※You can control your character to find and have sex with women in the village.
※Whether the women are serving in a restaurant, taking a walk, or giving a speech
in front of the villagers, you can have sex with them anytime.
※You can go outside the village to play with the succubi, training your penis to overpower stronger females.
※Each girl's pussy has a different durability.
If used too many times, the girl will get angry, and her dialogue will change.
※No combat.

CV(Breathing and climax only)
龍涎にこみ
貓乃しろね
朝比奈ゆの
御上サツキ
宮咲ミヤ
琴音あかり

Gameplay

Lustful succubi wander around the village.
You can interact with them to sharpen your sex skills.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains images and content of sexual assault and forced intercourse.

name: Happy Town

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11(64-bit)
  • Processor: 2.5+ GHz processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Installing the game on a SDD is highly recommended. Closing other programs especially browsers while running the game is recommended.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11(64-bit)
  • Processor: 3+ GHz processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Installing the game on a SDD is highly recommended. Closing other programs especially browsers while running the game is recommended.

short_description: On an island floating in the sky, to lift the curse from the villagers, the magician Erin is transformed into a male to imbue the villagers with magic. A heartwarming and joyful story is about to begin.
supported_languages: English, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Japanese
